duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and collaborate with Sales, Manufacturing, and Engineering teams in creating new designs and improving existing designs for high-quality and cost-effective product manufacturing.
Analyze market research and develop design concepts and proposals for various projects.
Conduct design reviews and manage multiple product development projects concurrently for timely delivery to the market.
Maintain professional and technical knowledge by attending workshops, reviewing publications, and participating in professional societies.
Frequently interface with customers to determine their needs and expectations, and fabricate samples of working models for demonstration.
Champion the use of Lean Manufacturing and Six Sigma principles for continuous improvement and prepare status updates on product development and design concepts.
Maintain and coordinate activities to ensure vital operational metrics and prepare product training sessions for new employees.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or a related field required, preferably a Bachelor of Science in Mechanical Engineering (MSME). Must have a passion for continuous learning and professional development. In lieu of a degree, significant experience in a related industry or equivalent education may be considered.
